 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-2-min.png> 	

UAE's MoM Community Launch

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/635376ccdc580fdb2ca37d7d698996b1680649666.gif> 	

The MoM Community is a space where mothers can connect, share their experiences, and co-create initiatives that empower working parents across the Group. The first gathering brought together moms for a purposeful working session to lay the foundation for this new initiative. Together, they identified key focus areas and proposed thoughtful solutions to help navigate the balance between motherhood and career.

Learn more here! <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1121&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Live With Our TA team

Live With Our TA team

Join Hadeel Akileh and Firdos Shaikh on our Instagram account <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1122&user=10620>  tomorrow, 27 May at 11:30am - 12:30pm as they share insider tips on: 

*	Building your personal brand
	
*	Crafting a standout CV
	
*	Acing interviews
*	What truly matters when applying to Chalhoub — especially in Retail Beauty, Frontline, and Digital Tech & Data roles.

Don’t miss the live Q&A at the end!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1122&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

Level Shoes Super Sale

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/0cba5da140120cd63714edc2e439066a1911140760.gif> 	

Enjoy up to 50% off on select styles, available both in-store and online for a limited time.

 T&Cs: Offer valid on select items and brands.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-6-min.png> 	

Creating impact Around our partners pillar

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1123&user=10620> 	

The Partners pillar is structured around three core focus areas:

*	Sustainability Across out Value Chain
*	Diverse Partnerships for Sustainable Growth
*	Innovative & Entrepreneurial Partnerships

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1123&user=10620> 	

The Partners pillar is structured around three core focus areas:

*	Sustainability Across out Value Chain
*	Diverse Partnerships for Sustainable Growth
*	Innovative & Entrepreneurial Partnerships

These components form the backbone of Chalhoub Group’s commitment to building a sustainable, innovative, and resilient value chain.
By collaborating with brand partners, suppliers, and startups, we drive innovation, improve supply chain transparency, and embed sustainability into every layer of our operations. Initiatives like The Greenhouse and our Brand Partner Engagement Programme are helping us set new industry standards and shape the future of responsible retail. Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1123&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-3-min.png> 	

WWD Global Fashion & Beauty Summit

The Group served as a proud sponsor of the WWD Global Fashion & Beauty Summit, hosted in Diriyah, Riyadh. where our Vice President of Strategy, Andrea Fetzer, took the stage to lead a talk titled “Asian Beauty on the Rise in GCC?”, where she shared valuable insights on the shifting dynamics of consumer preferences, the influence of Asian beauty brands, and their growing relevance in the Gulf market.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/1af1ed7b87990fd7804a7355328be6341167452834.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/06-3-min.png> 	

Adolfo Dominguez at ‘The Event’

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/1af1ed7b87990fd7804a7355328be6341167452834.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/06-3-min.png> 	

Adolfo Dominguez at ‘The Event’

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1124&user=10620> 	

On Friday, May 16th, Adolfo Dominguez took part in the inaugural edition of The Event - a newly launched fashion platform hosted by Concrete Alserkal. The brand was featured through a dedicated display, showcasing curated pieces from the Rebirth collection, offering attendees an intimate opportunity to explore the collection up close in a sophisticated and fashion-forward setting.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/07-7-min.png> 	

Swarovski Collection Previews

Last week, Swarovski stores in Galleria, Abu Dhabi and Mirdif City Centre sparkled with excitement as we hosted exclusive FW25 Collection Previews for our VIP clientele. Guests had the opportunity to discover and shop the upcoming collection ahead of launch, while enjoying colourful macarons, refreshing mocktails, and a charming live illustration experience — adding an artistic touch to a vibrant showcase.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1125&user=10620> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1126&user=10620>
